alert.note: Alert for Coastal Kleberg; Coastal Nueces; Coastal San Patricio; Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio; Kleberg Islands; Nueces Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 12 at 11:20AM CST until January 12 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Inland Kleberg, Inland Nueces, Inland San Patricio, Coastal Kleberg, Coastal Nueces, Coastal San Patricio, Kleberg Islands and Nueces Islands Counties. * WHEN...Until 3 PM CST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Kleberg; Coastal Nueces; Coastal San Patricio; Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio; Kleberg Islands; Nueces Islands
